parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  It mentions "opiniile dumneavoastră politice" (your political opinions) in a general sense, not targeting any specific candidate or party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The phrasing "vă invităm să ne acordați câteva minute pentru a ne ajuta să înțelegem mai bine opiniile dumneavoastră politice" (we invite you to give us a few minutes to help us better understand your political opinions) indicates an attempt to gather opinions from a broad segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. While the study concerns political opinions, the primary objective is not to directly influence the vote for a particular candidate. The post aims to gather data for a study ("Studiu privind comportamentul electoral"), not to promote a specific candidate or party. The link directs to a survey, not a campaign website.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the study might indirectly relate to political journalism by gathering public opinion, the post itself does not present news, analysis, or opinions in a journalistic manner. It's a call for participation in a survey, not a journalistic piece.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a formal invitation to participate in a research study.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>3530505243913692</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while related to political opinions, does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post invites participation in a survey about electoral behavior, not advocating for or against any specific candidate or party. The objective is research, not influencing the vote.  The post does not violate Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, as it lacks direct reference to a candidate, does not exceed the limits of journalistic information (it's a survey invitation), and its objective is not directly electoral.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
